T02nagpancu:535: ratnaṃ gṛhaṃ vā hastyaśvaṃ grāmaṃ vā śayanāsanam // Pk_4.36 //
T02nagpancu:536: dāsaṃ dāsīṃ priyāṃ bhāryāṃ putrīṃ cāpyativarṇabhām /
T02nagpancu:541: puṇyāpuṇyād vimuktaḥ svayamiha bhagavān jāyate vajrasattvaḥ // Pk_4.38 //
T02nagpancu:550: ekībhāvo bhaved yatra yuganaddhaṃ taducyate // Pk_5.2 //
T02nagpancu:551: saṅkleśaṃ vyavadānaṃ ca jñātvā tu paramārthataḥ /
T02nagpancu:552: ekībhāvaṃ tu yo vettiṃ sa vetti yuganaddhakam // Pk_5.3 //
T02nagpancu:554: ekīkṛtya cerad yogī sa vetti yuganaddhakam // Pk_5.4 //
T02nagpancu:555: grāhyaṃ ca grāhakaṃ caiva dvidhā buddhirna vidyate /
T02nagpancu:556: abhinnatā bhaved yatra tadāha yuganaddhakam // Pk_5.5 //
T02nagpancu:558: yuganaddhakramākhyaṃ vai tattvaṃ vetti sa paṇḍitaḥ // Pk_5.6 //
T02nagpancu:560: yuganaddha iti khyātaḥ kramo 'yaṃ buddhagocaraḥ // Pk_5.7 //
T02nagpancu:562: yatra sthito mahāyogī tad bhaved yuganaddhakam // Pk_5.8 //
T02nagpancu:564: ityevaṃ kalpanā nāsti tat taddhi yuganaddhakam // Pk_5.9 //
T02nagpancu:568: tayoreva samājaṃ yad yuganaddhakramo hyayam // Pk_5.11 //
T02nagpancu:570: utthānaṃ ca tato yatra samantād yuganaddhakam // Pk_5.12 //
T02nagpancu:571: saṃvṛtiṃ paramārthaṃ ca pṛthag jñātvā vibhāgataḥ /
T02nagpancu:572: saṃmīlanaṃ bhaved yatra yuganaddhaṃ taducyate // Pk_5.13 //
T02nagpancu:573: tathātalambanaṃ naiva vyutthānaṃ yatra naiva hi /
T02nagpancu:574: yuganaddhaṃ bhavet tacca yogināṃ padamavyayam // Pk_5.14 //
T02nagpancu:584: yā sthitiryogināṃ buddhā yuganaddhaṃ vadanti tat // Pk_5.19 //
T02nagpancu:588: iti yā kalpanābhinnā yatra tad yuganaddhakam // Pk_5.21 //
T02nagpancu:590: yaḥśāntiṃ vetti yogīndraḥ sa prāpto yuganaddhakam // Pk_5.22 //
T02nagpancu:591: evaṃ vai yaḥ sthito yogī yuganaddhakrame sthitaḥ /
T02nagpancu:592: ucyate sa hi sarvajñaḥ tattvadarśī ca viśvadhṛk // Pk_5.23 //
T02nagpancu:596: buddhatvaṃ vajrasattvatvaṃ sarvaiśvaryaṃ tathaiva ca // Pk_5.25 /
T02nagpancu:600: asyaiva vācakāḥ sarve nānyat tatrābhidhīyate // Pk_5.27 //
T02nagpancu:602: anenaiva gatā buddhā gaṅgāyāḥ sikatopamāḥ // Pk_5.28 //
T02nagpancu:604: bhāvayed yuganaddhaṃ tu caryāṃ cāpi tadanvayām // Pk_5.29 //
T02nagpancu:605: yathātmani tathā śatrau yathā bhāryā tathātmajā /
T02nagpancu:606: yathā mātā tathā vaiśyā yathā ḍombī tathā dvijā // Pk_5.30 //
T02nagpancu:607: yathā vastraṃ tathā carma yathā ratnaṃ tathā tuṣam /
T02nagpancu:608: yathā mūtraṃ tathā madyaṃ yathā bhaktaṃ tathā śakṛt // Pk_5.31 //
T02nagpancu:610: yathā stutikaraṃ vākyaṃ tathā vākyaṃ jugupsitam // Pk_5.32 //
T02nagpancu:611: yathā rudrastathā vajrī yathā rātrīstathā divā /
T02nagpancu:612: yathā svapnaṃ tathā dṛṣṭaṃ yathā naṣṭaṃ tathā sthitam // Pk_5.33 //
T02nagpancu:613: yathā saukhyaṃ tathā duḥkhaṃ yathā duṣṭastathā sutaḥ /
T02nagpancu:614: yathāvīcistathā svargastathā puṇyaṃ tu pāpakam // Pk_5.34 //
T02nagpancu:615: evaṃ jñātvā cared jñānī nirviśaṅkastu sarvakṛt /
T02nagpancu:618: anena krīḍatāṃ loko yuganaddhasamādhinā // iti // Pk_5.36 //
T02nagpancu:631: na satyā nāsatyā na ca tadubhayī nāpyanubhayī
T02nagpancu:636: ye dharmā hetuprabhavā hetusteṣāṃ tathāgato hyavadat /
T02nagpancu:637: teṣāṃ ca yo nirodha evaṃvādī mahāśramaṇaḥ //
